headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Newmont (NEM) After A 193% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Newmont’s share price still offers value after a strong run, this article walks through what the numbers actually say rather than the headlines. The stock last closed at US$112.96, with returns of 9.1% over 7 days, 15.1% over 30 days, 11.6% year to date, 193.3% over 1 year and 125.4% over 3 years. This naturally raises questions about how much upside or risk is now priced in. Recent coverage has focused on Newmont’s position in the materials sector and the way...
